content:
Question 44 of 50
Single choice question
You plan to move a distributed on-
premises app named App1 to an
Azure subscription.
After the planned move, App1 will be
hosted on several Azure virtual
machines.
You need to ensure that App1 always
runs on at least eight virtual machines
during planned Azure maintenance.
What should you create?
Select the correct answer
one virtual machine scale set that has 10 virtual machines instances
one Availability Set that has three fault domains and one update domain
one Availability Set that has 10 update domains and one fault domain
one virtual machine scale set that has 12 virtual machines instances
